mapper.insert: insert into `order`(cust_id, store_id, state, price, num, commodity, phone, note,code) values (#{custId}, #{storeId}, #{state}, #{price}, #{num}, #{commodity}, #{phone}, #{note},#{code})
mapper.update: update `order` set state = #{state}, phone = #{phone}, note = #{note} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from `order` where cust_id = #{custId} order by createtime DESC
SELECT ifnull(SUM(`order`.num),0) AS num FROM `order` WHERE `order`.store_id = #{arg0} AND ( `order`.state = 1 OR `order`.state = 2 ) AND `order`.createtime <= #{arg1}
SELECT ifnull(SUM(`order`.num),0) AS num FROM `order` WHERE `order`.store_id = #{arg0} AND ( `order`.state = 1 OR `order`.state = 2 )
